title: Addressing the Child Care Crisis With Gloria Riviera
description:
America’s child care system is broken. Parents are struggling to find care and centers are struggling to provide care, which means our kids are struggling, too. How did we get into this mess… and how do we fix it? In today’s episode, Dr. Becky talks with Gloria Riviera—a journalist, mom of three, and podcast host of “No One Is Coming to Save Us”—about why caring for our kids is a systemic issue. With personal stories, data, and practical calls-to-action, their conversation will not only help you feel less alone in your struggles as a caregiver, but also give you tools for change. Remember: We’re in this together.<p/>
<p/>
For more, listen to Gloria’s podcast, “No One Is Coming to Save Us” here: https://lemonadamedia.com/show/noictsu/ <p/>
